scripts.package-moon-key: node_modules/.bin/tsc moon-key.ts; node_modules/.bin/pkg -t node14 moon-key.js; rm moon-key.js
scripts.moonbeam-launch: yarn run build-moonbeam-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node moonbeam-launch.ts
scripts.moonbeam-test: yarn run build-moonbeam-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node moonbeam-test.ts
scripts.test-staking: yarn run build-moonbeam-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node test-staking.ts
